member.name: DDCOLORKEY
member.summary: The DDCOLORKEY structure describes a source color key, destination color key, or color space. A color key is specified if the low and high range values are the same. This structure is used with the and methods.

member.name: DDCOLORKEY.dwColorSpaceLowValue
member.summary: Low value of the color range that is to be used as the color key.

member.name: DDCOLORKEY.dwColorSpaceHighValue
member.summary: High value of the color range that is to be used as the color key.
